title: Commit test improvements, perform code review, and push changes
DEPRECATED: Remove translate/explain/grammar from analyze endpoint
description: SCOPE CHANGED: We are NOT removing action types from /api/analyze. This is an additive-only change. Analyze endpoint keeps all existing actions.

title: Update all phrase action prompts to output markdown-formatted responses for better client-side rendering
description: The chrome extension will add markdown rendering support to the ResultsPanel. Update prompts for translate, explain, grammar, vocabulary, kanji, and conjugation actions to format their responses using markdown (headings, bold, lists, code blocks, etc.) instead of plain text.

title: Fix conjugation action prompt: usageExample.japanese contains verbose analysis instead of clean example sentence
description: The usageExample.japanese field is receiving all the verbose analysis text including conjugation breakdowns, context explanations, and meta-text like '(End of analysis)' and '(JSON output follows)'. It should only contain a simple, clean example sentence. Fix the Gemini prompt structure to properly separate analysis from the JSON response schema.

title: Fix over-granular tokenization in identify-phrase endpoints
description: Enhance tokenization prompt instructions to keep conjugated verbs/adjectives and compound nouns as single tokens instead of splitting into morphemes. Update buildIdentifyPrompt() and buildIdentifyPhrasesPrompt() in src/services/gemini.ts

title: Enhance /api/identify-phrase to return multiple phrases with pre-computed actions
description: BREAKING CHANGE: Modify /api/identify-phrase endpoint to detect and return ARRAY of phrases (each with bounding box + pre-computed translation/explain/grammar actions) instead of single phrase. Add maxPhrases parameter (default: 25, max: 100). Remove /api/identify-phrases endpoint. Update GeminiService.identifyPhrase prompt and response handling. Update tests.

Epic: Pre-compute phrase actions in identify-phrase endpoint
description:
ADDITIVE CHANGE: Modify identify-phrase endpoint to return pre-computed translation, explain, and grammar analysis alongside existing fields. This eliminates 3 separate API calls for phrase actions, improving latency. The /api/analyze endpoint KEEPS all action types (translate, explain, grammar, vocabulary, conjugation) for potential future use.
